In this study, we screen archaeological soil samples by microscopy and analyse the samples by next generation sequencing to obtain results with parasites at species level and untargeted findings of plant and animal DNA. Three separate sediment layers of an ancient man-made pond in Hoby, Denmark, ranging from 100 BC to 200 AD, were analysed by micro...

Genomic history of Aboriginal Australians

View
Glacial history of NW Siberia (Taimyr)
Project
We are gradually probing into the stratigraphy and glacial history of NW Siberia. The emphasis is on the last glacial cycle, but we also go further back in time. Published and pending results are based on expedition to Taimyr and Severnaya Zemlya in 1996, 1998, 1999, 2002, 2003, 2010 and 2012. We are in the process - no, it is done now in 2019 - of writing papers on field data from the 2010/2012 expeditions to Southern Taimyr.
